table_utils.sql_template:
truncate table STG_REF_SMC_ISSUER_ab /
insert --+append into STG_REF_SMC_ISSUER_ab SELECT I.ISSUERCOUNTRYOFRISK AS ISS_CTRY, I.ISSUERCOUNTRY AS ORIG_ISS_CTRY, I.SMCI AS SMC_ISSUER_ID, I.ISSUERCOUNTRYOFINCORPORATION AS ISSUER_CTRY_OF_INCORP, I.ISSUERNAME AS SMC_ISSUER_NAM, USER AS CRTD_BY, systimestamp AS CRTD_TS, USER AS LST_UPDT_BY, systimestamp AS LST_UPDT_TS FROM C160970SMC.ISSUER@gmail.com I WHERE I.SMCI IN (SELECT smci FROM C160970SMC.ISSUER_LAST_UPDATE@gmail.com SLU WHERE DDAMODIFIEDTS > '07-AUG-12 03.19.13 AM' ) /
commit /
set line 300
SELECT dfo_number, tq_id, server_Type, MIN (num_rows), MAX (num_rows), COUNT ( * ) dop FROM v$pq_tqstat GROUP BY dfo_number, tq_id, server_Type ORDER BY dfo_number, tq_id, server_type DESC /
